TEXT.TITLE: PDA ENGINEERING <PDAS> HALTS SOFTWARE SHIPMENTS
TEXT.BODY: PDA Engineering said it has temporarily deferred shipmetns of its PATRAN software for IBM computers, due to a technical problem with the program. The company said the deferral will reduce its thrid quarter revenues and earnings. PDA said it anticipates resuming shipments in the fourth quarter. Reuter
